name: Police Chase Blast - Bike Rider
description:
Join the special police bike squad and chase criminals. Ride your shiny new police bike to hunt down gangsters & make the city safe. Street crime is going to end as now you will be riding a fast bike and making arrests. This is an action packed game and will surely give you an adrenaline kick.

Chase criminals, arrest gangsters and stop thugs to restore city peace. Everyone is looking up to you!
